entry.title: My favorite Gnome terminal font is fixedsys-excelsior
entry.content: Finding a good monospaced font for Gnome terminal was used to be my big wish. I have tried bitstream mono, droid sans mono, inconsola. None of them was satisfactory in Gnome terminal with dark background(much better in white background but I don't like white background). Finally, my heart has been settled down with fixedsys-excelsior. It just looks very comfortable with my black background.
